ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby gone missing?
ygData.msgSnippet: I had the same trouble , i made 15 and went to the Bard s Guild looking for the lvl 15 song , but didn t find it. Then I asked a higher level bard and he told
ygData.messageBody:
I had the same trouble , i made 15 and went to the Bard's Guild looking for
the lvl 15 song , but didn't find it. Then I asked a higher level bard and he
told me to go to Freeport, I wen't to Freeport and it wasn't there, so i hung
out for a couple of days.(I didn't want to just turn right back around) Then
when I went back to the Bards Guild , and was just looking at songs and i
saw it. But I swear it wasn't there before! Weird , anyway I think it was on
the girl to your left as you go through the second door. If not , i'm losing
it again.

Ulaien - 15th lvl Bard of Tunare
